xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/493792-Catalonia: Spain on the Verge of a Nervous Breakdown 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rDKsCs9gM9V0WQnHm1wu98tHp7Q.jpg A serious crisis has shaken Spain since the referendum on self-determination and the proclamation of the independence of Catalonia by the government of Carles Puigdemont, bold actions firmly fought by the Spanish government by applying the constitutional article that allows it to place a region under guardianship. While Spain is on the verge of implosion, Europe is holding its breath. Catalonia: Spain on the Verge of a Nervous Breakdown
